refsect1.title: Fundamental Support
refsect1.para:
Crank System is fairly a large library which provides complex features, from basic vector computations, to scene rendering, and other tasks.
Fundamental part of Crank System provides versioning and general purpose macros, typedefs.

refsect1.title: Basic Data Structures
refsect1.para: Although Crank System is a game support library, it contains some mathematical structures like Permutation, complex types. This would be useful modeling or simulating parts of world.

refsect1.title: Vectors and Matrices
refsect1.para:
Vectors and Matrix types are frequently used in 3D applications, and also in games, as they can represent arbitarly position in 2D/3D space.
Might not useful in most of games, but Crank System also provides complex vector and matrix for modeling, and simulating.

refsect1.title: Graphs
refsect1.para: Crank System also provides graphs which are used through out games. Currently, Crank System only provides digraph implementation.
